recipe.title: Larb
recipe.ingredient: 3 cups rice noodles cooked and chopped
recipe.step: Prepare lettuce leaves and set aside.
Combine lime juice, fish sauce and sugar, stir to combine and set aside.
Heat oil in pan and cook meat until brown.
Add garlic, ginger and chilli and cook a few minutes.
Pour in juice mixture and stir through with noodles.
Sever inside a lettuce cup with lime on the side.
Alternately serve in told with thinly sliced cumber, lettuce and some chilli sauce.
